name: Internal (Team Octoforce)
description:
A third person horror escape game with some puzzle elements added in.

Players Objective: 

  • Escape from the house.
  • Find notes throughout the level to learn the combination for the escape door.
  • Stay away from the creatures lurking in the house.

If you could take some time to fill out this Feedback sheet it would be super helpful for us! https://goo.gl/forms/sIjiOpGCGNXIXj163
